433:1: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ snātvā ca bhuktvā kāyabalasthāma saṃjanayya yena ṣoḍaśākārasaṃpannapṛthivipradeśe mahābodhidrumarājamūlaṃ tena pratasthe vijayayā tayā ca gatyā,
433:2: yāsau mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ gatiranuccalitagatirindriyeṣṭigatiḥ susaṃsthitagatiḥ merurājagatirajihmagatirakuṭilagatiranupadrutagatiravilambitagatiraluḍitagatiraskhalitagatirasaṃghaṭitagatiralīnagatiracapalagatiḥ salīlagatiḥ vimalagatiḥ śubhagatiradoṣagatiramohagatiraraktagatiḥ siṃhagatiḥ haṃsarājagatirnāgarājagatirnārāyaṇagatiḥ dharaṇitalāsaṃsṛṣṭagatiḥ sahasrāracakradharaṇītalacitragatiḥ jālāṅgulitāmranakhagatiḥ dharaṇītalanirnādagatiḥ śailarājasaṃghaṭanagatiḥ utkūlanikūlasamakaracaraṇagatiḥ jālāntarābhāraśmyutsarjanasattvasaṃspṛśanasugatigamanagatiḥ vimalapadmakramanikṣipaṇagatiḥ pūrvaśubhasucaritagamanagatiḥ pūrvabuddhasiṃhābhigamanagatiḥ vajradṛḍhābhedyāśayagatiḥ (sarvopāyagatiḥ)
433:5: trisāhasramahāsāhasraikaśūragatiḥ svayaṃbhvanabhibhūtagatiḥ sarvajñajñānābhigamanagatiḥ smṛtimatigatiḥ sugatigamanagatiḥ jarāmaraṇapraśamanagatiḥ śivavirajāmalābhayanirvāṇapuragamanagatiḥ|
433:7: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvacca nadyā nairañjanāyā yāvacca bodhimaṇḍādestasminnantare vātabalāhakairdevaputraiḥ saṃmṛṣṭamabhūt|
433:9: yāvadeva trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau vṛkṣāste sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastenābhinatāgrā abhūvan|
433:10: ye'pi ca tadahojātā bāladārikāste'pi bodhimaṇḍaśīrṣakāḥ svapanti sma|
433:11: ye'pi ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sumerupramukhāḥ parvatāste'pi sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastena praṇatā abhūvan|
433:12: nadīṃ ca nairañjanāmupādāya yāvadbodhimaṇḍo'sminnantare kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ krośavistāraikapramāṇo mārgo'bhivyūhito'bhūt|
433:13: tasya ca mārgasya vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ pārśvayoḥ saptaratnamayī vedikā abhinirmitā'bhūt|
433:14: saptatālānuccaistvena upariṣṭādratnajālasaṃchannā divyachatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛtā iṣukṣepe saptaratnamayāstālā abhinirmitā abhūvan tasyā vedikāyā abhyudgatāḥ|
433:16: dvayośca tālayormadhye puṣkariṇī māpitābhūt gandhodakaparipūrṇā suvarṇavālikrāsaṃstṛtā utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā ratnavedikāparivṛtā vaidūryamaṇiratnasopānapratyuptā āḍibalākāhaṃsacakravākamayūropakūjitā|
433:17: taṃ ca mārgamaśītyapsaraḥsahasrāṇi gandhodakena siñcanti sma|
433:19: sarvasya ca tālavṛkṣasya purato ratnavyomakaḥ saṃsthito'bhūt|
433:20: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavyomake aśītyapsaraḥ sahasrāṇi candanāgurucūrṇakapuṭāparigṛhītāni kārānusāridhūpaghaṭikāparigṛhītāni sthitānyabhūvan|
433:22: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prakampyamānaiḥ kṣetrai raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścārayaṃstūryaśatasahasraiḥ pravādyamānaiḥ,
433:29: anenaivaṃrūpeṇa mārgavyūhena bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍaṃ gacchati sma|
433:31: tāmeva rātriṃ vaśavartī nāma trisāhasramahāsāhasrādhipatirbrahmā sahāpatirbrahmaparṣadamāmantryaivamāha-yatkhalu mārṣā jānīyāḥ|
433:32: eṣa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāpratijñānutsṛṣṭo dṛḍhasaṃnāhasaṃnaddho'parikhinnamānasaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsu nirjātaḥ sarvapāramitāsu pāraṃgataḥ sarvabodhisattvabhūmiṣu vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvabodhisattvāśayasuviśuddhaḥ sarvasattvendriyeṣvanugataḥ sarvatathāgataguhyasthāneṣu supraviṣṭaḥ sarvamārakarmapathasamatikrāntaḥ sarvakuśalamūleṣvaparapratyayaḥ sarvatathāgatairadhiṣṭhitaḥ sarvasattveṣu pramokṣamārgadeśayitā mahāsārthavāhaḥ|
433:36: mahāprajñāprabhotsarjanakaraḥ mahāketurājaḥ aṣṭalokadharmānupaliptaḥ mahāpadmabhūtaḥ sarvadharmadhāraṇyasaṃpramuṣitaḥ mahāsāgarabhūtaḥ anunayapratighāpagataḥ acalo'prakampī mahāsumerūbhūtaḥ|
433:37: sunirmalaḥ supariśuddhaḥ svavadarpitavimalabuddhirmahāmaṇiratnabhūtaḥ sarvadharmavaśavartī sarvakarmaṇyacitto mahābrahmabhūto bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkramati mārasainyapradharṣaṇārthamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ|
433:38: daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaparipuraṇārthaṃ mahādharmacakrapravartanārthaṃ mahāsiṃhanādanādanārthaṃ sarvasattvān dharmadānena saṃtarpaṇārthaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dharmacakṣurviśodhanārthaṃ sarvaparapravādīnāṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahārthaṃ pūrvapratijñāpāripūrisaṃdarśanārthaṃ sarvadharmaiśvaryavaśitāprāptyartham|
433:40: atha khalu vaśavartī mahābrahmā tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata—
433:41: yasyā tejatu puṇyataśca śiriye brāhmaḥ patho jñāyate
433:42: maitrī vā karuṇā upekṣa muditā dhyānānyabhijñāstathā||
433:44: pūjāṃ sādhu karotha tasya munino āśivrate sādhanām||1||
433:45: yaṃ gatvā śaraṇaṃ na durgatibhayaṃ prāpnoti naivākṣaṇaṃ
433:46: deveṣviṣṭasukhaṃ ca prāpya vipulaṃ brahmālayaṃ gacchati|
433:50: śakrābrahmapure ca candrasuriye nāstyasya kaścit samaḥ|
433:52: saiṣo'dya vrajate mahādrumavaraṃ mārasya jetuṃ camūn||3||
433:53: mūrdhnaṃ yasya na śakyamīkṣitumiha brahmālaye'pi sthitaiḥ
433:56: cittaṃ yasya praśānta doṣarahitaṃ gacchāma tatpūjane||4||
433:57: yeṣāṃ vā mati brahmaśakrabhavane nityaṃ sukha kṣepituṃ
433:58: athavā sarvakileśabandhanalatāṃ chettuṃ hi tāṃ jālinīm|
433:60: buddhatvaṃ yadi vepsitaṃ tribhuvane pūjetvasau nāyakam||5||
433:65: iti hi bhikṣavastrisāhasramahāsāhasriko mahābrahmā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ samamadhyatiṣṭhat|
433:67: sarve ca tadā mahāsamudrā dharaṇītalasaṃsthitā abhūvan|
433:69: imaṃ caiva lokadhātumalaṃkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca daśasu dikṣu śakrabrahmalokapālairbodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe buddhakṣetraśatasahasrāṇi samalaṃkṛtānyabhūvan|
433:70: bodhisattvaiśca divyamānuṣyakātikrāntaiḥ pūjāvyūhairdaśasu dikṣvaprameyāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi pratimaṇḍitānyabhūvan bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe|
433:71: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇyekamiva buddhakṣetraṃ saṃdṛśyante sma,
433:73: na ca bhūyo lokāntarikā na ca kālaparvatā na ca cakravālamahācakravālāḥ prajñāyante sma|
433:74: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bodhisattvasyābhayā sphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma|
433:76: tadyathā-utkhalī ca nāma devaputraḥ sūtkhalī ca nāma prajāpatiśca śūrabalaśca keyūrabalaśca supratisthitaśca mahiṃdharaśca avabhāsakaraśca vimalaśca dharmeśvaraśca dharmaketuśca siddhapātraśca apratihatanetraśca mahāvyūhaśca śīlaviśuddhanetraśca padmaprabhaśca|
433:77: itīme ṣoḍaśa bodhimaṇḍapratipālakā devaputrāḥ sarve'vaivartyakṣāntipratilabdhāste bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ maṇḍayanti sma|
433:78: samantādaśītiyojanāni saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ saptabhī ratnasūtraiḥ parivṛtam,
433:80: ye ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu vividhā vṛkṣāḥ santyabhijātā abhipūjitā divyamānuṣyakāste'pi sarve tatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma|
433:81: yāśca daśasu dikṣu nānāprakārā jalasthalajāḥ puṣpajātayastā api sarvāstatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma|
433:82: ye'pi ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā bodhimaṇḍālaṃkurvantyapramāṇapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāravyūhaiste'pi tatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma||
433:83: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhimaṇḍaparipālakairdevaputraistādṛśā vyūhā bodhimaṇḍe abhinirmitā abhūvan,
433:89: ete catvāro bodhivṛkṣadevatā bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ māpayanti sma mūlasaṃpannaṃ skandhasaṃpannaṃ śākhāpatrapuṣpaphalasaṃpannaṃ ārohapariṇāhasaṃpannaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ vistīrṇamaśītistālānuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa pariṇāhena citraṃ darśanīyaṃ manoramaṃ saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhī ratnatālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ saptabhī ratnasūtraiḥ samantādanuparivṛtairanuparikṣiptaṃ pārijātakakovidāraprakāśamatṛptacakṣurdarśanam|
433:90: sa ca pṛthivīpradeśastrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuvajreṇābhidṛḍhaḥ sāro'bhedyavajramayaḥ saṃsthito'bhūt yatra bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo'bhūdbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ||
433:91: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvena bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkramatā tathārūpā kāyātprabhā muktābhūt,
433:106: na ca kasyacitsattvasya tasmin samaye rāgo bādhate dveṣo va moho vā krodho vā lobho vā khilo vā vyāpādo vā īrṣyā vā mātsaryo vā|
433:110: sarvasattvāśca tasmin samaye maitracittā hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṃjñino'bhūvan||
433:113: duḥkhaṃ praśāntaṃ sattvānāṃ sukhaṃ vindanti vedanām||7||
433:122: rāgadveṣādibhiḥ kleśaiḥ sattvā bādhyanta ye sadā|
433:126: na khilaṃ na ca mātsaryaṃ vyāpādo na ca vigrahaḥ|
433:133: sarve te vipulāḥ kṣetrāḥ dṛśyantyekaṃ yathā tathā||17||
433:139: te sarve tatra dṛśyante bodhisattvasya tejasā||20||
433:150: guṇāḥ śakyā na te vācā sarve saṃparikīrtitum|
433:152: iti hi bhikṣavastayā bodhisattvasya kāyapramuktayā prabhayā kālikasya nāgarājasya bhavanamavabhāsitamabhūt viśuddhayā vimalayā kāyacittaprahlādaudvilyajananyā sarvakleśāpakarṣiṇyā sarvasattvasukhaprītiprasādaprāmodyajananyā|
433:153: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ kāliko nāgarājastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svasya parivārasya purataḥ sthitvemā gāthā abhāṣat—
433:154: krakuchande yatha ābha dṛṣṭa rucirā dṛṣṭā ca kanakāhvaye
433:157: yenedaṃ bhavanaṃ virocati hi me svarṇaprabhālaṃkṛtam||27||
433:159: no cāgnerna maṇerna vidyudamalā no ca prabhā jyotiṣām|
433:160: no vā śakraprabhā na brahmaṇa prabhā no ca prabhā āsurī
433:161: ekāntaṃ tamasākulaṃ mama gṛhaṃ prāgduṣkṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ||28||
433:162: adyedaṃ bhavanaṃ virājati śubhaṃ madhye raviṃdīptivat
433:163: cittaṃ prīti janeti kāyu sukhito gātrādbhutā śītalā|
433:164: taptā vālika yā śarīri nipatī jātā sa me śītalā
433:166: śīghraṃ gṛhṇata nāgapuṣpa rucirā vastrāṃ sugandhāṃ śubhāṃ
433:168: saṃgītiṃ prakṛrudhva vādya vividhā bherīmṛdaṅgaiḥ śubhaiḥ
433:169: hantā gacchatha pūjanā hitakaraṃ pūjārha sarve jage||30||
433:173: pūjāṃ tasya karonti hṛṣṭamanaso darśenti mārgo hyayam||31||
433:174: saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa hi nāgarāṭ sumuditaścābhyarcya lokottamaṃ
433:176: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasaḥ kurvanti pūjāṃ muneḥ
433:180: yatha me dṛṣṭa nimitta pūrvaṛṣiṇāṃ paśyāmi tāneva te
433:181: adya tvaṃ vinihatya mārabalavāniṣṭaṃ padaṃ lapsyase||33||
433:182: yasyārthe damadānasaṃyama pure sarvā ti tyāgī abhūt
433:185: saiṣā te paripūrṇa sarva praṇidhī adyā jino bheṣyase||34||
433:189: haṃsā kroñcagaṇā yathā ca gagane gacchanti līlānvitaṃ
433:191: yatha vā kāñcanavarṇa ābha rucirā kṣatrāśatā gacchate
433:192: śāntāścāpi yathā apāya nikhilā duḥkhairvimuktā prajāḥ|
433:196: brahmā brahmapurohitāśca amarā utsṛjya dhyānaṃ sukham|
433:197: ye kecittribhave tathaiva ca pure sarve ihābhyāgatāḥ
433:199: mārgaścāpi yathā viśodhitu surairyenādya tvaṃ gacchase
433:201: yatha vā padma viśuddha nirmala śubhā bhittvā mahīmudgatāḥ
433:203: mārāḥ koṭisahasra nekanayutā gaṅgā yathā vālikāḥ
433:204: te tubhyaṃ na samartha bodhiviṭapāccāletu kampetu vā|
433:205: yajñā naikavidhāḥ sahasranayutā gaṅgā yathā vālikāḥ
433:209: caturo dhātava kaści vijñapuruṣo darśeya ekaikaśaḥ
433:211: lābhā mahya sulabdha vṛddhi vipulā dṛṣṭo'si yatsārathe
433:212: pūjā caiva kṛtā guṇāśca kathitā bodhāya cotsāhitaḥ|
433:213: sarvā nāgavadhū ahaṃ ca sasutā mucyemito yonitaḥ
433:214: tvaṃ yāsī yatha mattavāraṇagate gacchema evaṃ vayam||41||iti||
433:215: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ kālikasya nāgarājasyāgramahiṣī suvarṇaprabhāsā nāma,
433:216: sā saṃbahulābhirnāgakanyābhiḥ parivṛtā puraskṛtā nānāratnachatraparigṛhītābhiḥ nānādūṣyaparigṛhītābhirnānāmuktāhāraparigṛhītābhiḥ nānāmaṇiratnaparigṛhītābhiḥ divyamānuṣyakamālyavilepanaguṇṭhaparigṛhītābhiḥ nānāgandhaghaṭikāparigṛhītābhiḥ nānātūryasaṃgītisaṃpravāditairnānāratnapuṣpavarṣairbodhisattvaṃ gacchantamabhyavakiranti sma||
433:236: prapūrṇā ti āśā ayaṃ prāptu kālo
433:238: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat-kutra niṣaṇṇaistaiḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā iti|
433:240: atha khalvantarīkṣagatāni śuddhāvāsakāyikadevaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya cetobhireva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāyaivaṃ vāco bhāṣante sma-evametat satpuruṣa, evametat|
433:241: tṛṇasaṃstare satpuruṣa niṣadya taiḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā iti||
433:242: adrākṣītkhalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mārgasya dakṣiṇe pārśve svastikaṃ yāvasikam tṛṇāni lūnāti sma nīlāni mṛdukāni sukumārāṇi ramaṇīyāni kuṇḍalajātāni pradakṣiṇāvartāni|
433:244: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbodhisattvo mārgādapakramya yena svastiko yāvasikastenopasaṃkrāmat|
433:245: upasaṃkramya svastikaṃ yāvasikaṃ madhurayā vācā samālapati sma|
433:246: yāsau vāgājñāpanī vijñāpanī vispaṣṭā anekalokaikavarṇasukhā valguḥ śravaṇīyā snigdhā smaraṇīyā codanī toṣaṇī premaṇī akarkaśā agadgadā aparuṣā acapalā ślakṣṇā madhurā karṇasukhā kāyacittodbilyakaraṇī rāgadoṣamohakalikaluṣavinodanī kalaviṅkarutasvarā kuṇālajīvaṃjīvakābhinaditaghoṣā dundubhisaṃgītirutaravitanirghoṣavatī anapahatā satyā acchā bhūtā brahmasvarutaravitanirghoṣā samudrasvaraveganibhā śailasaṃghaṭṭanavatī devendrāsurendrābhiṣṭutā gambhīrā duravagāhā namucibalābalakaraṇī parapravādamathanī siṃhasvaravegā hayagajagarjitaghoṣā nāganirnādanī meghastanitābhigarjitasvarā daśadiksarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇī vineyasattvasaṃcodanī adrutā anupahatā avilambitā sahitā yuktā kālavādinī samayānatikramaṇī dharmaśatasahasrasugrathitā saumyā asaktā adhiṣṭhitapratibhānā ekarutā sarvarutaracanī sarvābhiprāyajñāpanī sarvasukhasaṃjananī mokṣapathasaṃdarśikā mārgasaṃbhāravādinī parṣadanatikramaṇī sarvaparṣatsaṃtoṣaṇī sarvabuddhabhāṣitānukūlā|
433:247: īdṛśyā vācā bodhisattvaḥ svastikaṃ yāvasikaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata—
433:279: tada paścājjina vyākaronti munayo bhaviṣyasi virajaḥ||54||
433:280: yadi bodhi iya śakyu svastikā parajani dadituṃ
433:281: piṇḍīkṛtya dadeya prāṇināṃ ma bhavatu vimatiḥ|
433:282: yada bodhī maya prāpta jānasī vibhajami amṛtaṃ
433:283: āgatvā śṛṇu dharmayukta tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi virajaḥ||55||
433:288: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya bodhivṛkṣamupasaṃkrāmato'śītibodhivṛkṣasahasrāṇi devaputraiśca bodhisattvaiśca maṇḍitānyabhūvan-iha niṣadya bodhisattvo bodhiṃ prāpsyatyabhisaṃbhotsyata iti|
433:296: sarveṣu teṣu bodhivṛkṣamūleṣu yathānurūpāṇi siṃhāsanāni prajñaptānyabhūvan nānādivyadūṣyasaṃstṛtāni|
433:300: bodhisattvaśca lalitavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma|
433:301: samanantarasamāpannasya ca bodhisattvasyemaṃ lalitavyūhaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhim,
433:302: atha tatkṣaṇameva bodhisattvaḥ sarveṣu ca teṣu bodhivṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsane saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma lakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtena kāyena|
433:303: ekaikaśca bodhisattvo devaputraiścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma-mamaiva siṃhāsane bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo nānyeṣāmiti|
433:304: yathā ca te saṃjānate sma-tathāsyaiva lalitavyūhasya bodhisattvasamādheranubhāvena sarvanirayatiryagyoniyamalokikāḥ sarve devamanuṣyāśca sarve gatyupapannāḥ sarvasattvā bodhisattvaṃ paśyanti sma bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇam||
433:305: atha ca punarhīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ matiparitoṣaṇārthaṃ bodhisattvastṛṇamuṣṭimādāya yena bodhivṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat|
433:306: upasaṃkramya bodhivṛkṣaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svayamevābhyantarāgraṃ bahirmūlaṃ samantabhadraṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ saṃstīrya siṃhavacchūravadbalavaddṛḍhavīryavatsthāmavannāgavadaiśvaryavatsvayaṃbhūvajjñānivadanuttara-vadviśeṣavadabhyudratavadyaśovatkīrtivaddānavacchīlavatkṣāntivadvīryavaddhyānavatprajñāvajjñānavatpuṇya-vannihatamārapratyarthikavatsaṃbhāravatparyaṅkamābhujya tasmiṃstṛṇasaṃstare nyaṣīdat prāṅmukha ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya|
